item.title: How to build strong technology career?
item.description: The full article "How to Build a Strong Career in Tech" from Thiago Ghisi is at https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/how-build-strong-career-tech-thiago-ghisi/. I want to put the gist here for my reference. How does a Successful Career in Tech look like? Definition of a Successful Career The candidate resume metadata doesnâ€™t often lie resume metadata: Impact of their ideas on a large number of people directly or indirectly. Success = Impact & Influence!
